title: 1934 Babe Ruth and Lou Gehrig RRPC - SOLD!
author: pencil1974

posts.post_title: 1934 Babe Ruth and Lou Gehrig RRPC - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Great looking card with an older gentleman from spring training in 1934. The older man played in the 1890's and brought a few balls from the era for Gehrig and Ruth to see I assume.

The photos is crystal clear. This is the highest graded version of this postcard with only 1 other example graded.

$SOLD delivered FF PayPal or add 3% regular PP
